author: cardanochina
title: Dumpling Twitter Space
description: The English-speaking Cardano audience has limited knowledge about what is happening in China and in the Chinese-speaking Cardano community.
solution: Host and join epochly Twitter spaces to give updates and analyses on Chinese community update and general community update.
experience:
Built a Chinese-speaking Cardano community in the past 7 months single-handedly
Received a multitude of great feedback from previous Spaces
